item.title: The comprehensive guide to the women's hoops season, including preseason picks
item.description: Who's winning the 2026 national title and other preseason picks, predictions.

item.title: 17 men's college basketball teams that could win 30 games in 2025-26
item.description: History says a 30-win season could lead to a national title (see: Florida). Which teams could achieve the feat this season?

item.title: Sources: Eagles land Phillips in Dolphins trade
item.description: The Eagles have acquired Jaelan Phillips in a trade with the Dolphins, sources told ESPN.

item.title: Sources: QB Daniels dislocated elbow in loss
item.description: Jayden Daniels is expected to be sidelined indefinitely, but it is uncertain whether his season is over, sources said.

item.title: Darnold stars with 4 TDs in win, boosts MVP odds
item.description: En route to a 38-14 win over the Commanders on Sunday night, Seahawks quarterback Sam Darnold finished 21-of-24 with 330 yards, four touchdowns and on...
